teacher_info.intro:
My name is Kristina and I’m a tutor from Ukraine, live in Kyiv. My Master’s degree says that I’m a manager, but my heart sets on teaching. 

Literally, English has become my life. I binge-watch Netflix, listen to music, read articles and books in origin, and speak English for at least 5 hours a day. I love to improve my knowledge in it, train my pronunciation and find some differences between British and American accents. 

As for my hobbies, I’m fond of reading about our brain and how it works, like cross-stitching, enjoy brewing coffee in different ways, and love spending time with my friends.
teacher_info.short_signature: Ukrainian girl teaching English, popularizing Ukrainian language & helping u practice spoken rus

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My teaching journey started almost 3 years ago. I used to help my groupmates and friends a long time before.
I believe that for gaining a good level, grammar is not less important than speaking practice. So even if improving grammar is not your goal, I’ll guide you through it in our conversations.
My goals as a teacher are:
-> to give you structured knowledge of a language so you can grasp the logic and ideas of it
-> make you feel comfortable and confident in speaking a foreign language 
-> help you to fulfill your dreams in areas where you need the language
-> show you that English is fun and cool
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I love individual lessons on account of better engagement and closer work on personal goals.
My lessons are built in a conversational style (it means that we speak all the time). It could be free-style talking or discussing some particular topic with working on the key vocabulary. Also, I include various kinds of activities to train your listening, reading, and writing skills.

course_info.trial_description: Use the trial lesson to get acquainted with me and tell me about your expectations for learning a language, so we can set your goals and move towards them faster.

pro_course_detail.title: Ukrainian with the native
pro_course_detail.description:
As Ukrainian is my native language I can help you learn it and improve your speaking skills.

These lessons focus on conversation practice, so we will learn:

- useful words and phrases by topics (traveling, make an order, taxi, etc.)

Also, I'd love to share with you information about Ukrainian traditions and culture if you want to visit Ukraine or simply are interested in it.

pro_course_detail.title: English as a second language
pro_course_detail.description: These lessons are focused on improving your general level of English by learning both grammar and new vocabulary. So we will use exercises, read some articles and watch short videos on various topics based on your learning goals.

pro_course_detail.description:

- enlarge your vocabulary knowledge (words, phrasal verbs, idiomatic expressions) in the context
- learn modern English slang
- train and improve your speaking skills

teacher_info.intro: Hello, everyone! I'm Vlada and I am Ukrainian. I speak Ukrainian and Russian all my life. Being bilingual, I was quite interested in my native languages and beyond, which made me start learning English when I was 7. Now I am an English, Ukrainian and Russian tutor. I am inspired by music, art, and literature, as I see them as beautiful expressive tools. I believe consuming the content you love in the language you're trying to speak is one of the best ways really get it and improve. I like helping people express themselves and feel comfortable even when making mistakes since it is a part of any process.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a patient and attentive teacher. I have experience training students for exam purposes, conducting interviews, expanding and deepening their knowledge in Business English, Medical English, English for Illustrators, Animators, etc. I have worked with quite a few beginners and know how to make a good start. I want to help you enjoy the process of language learning and overcome any speaking barriers. I know languages are fairly hard for those who are only starting to learn. Encountering the Slavic group of languages can be scary even) Though once you start getting the feel of it you will fall in love with its complexity and have no problem speaking fluently.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching style is an intuitive structure. Students are different and I like seeking the best approach to each. That is why I appreciate the feedback a lot. I teach students to understand and navigate the language, whether it is a formal conversation, a presentation, or a casual chit-chat; to gradually learn how to get rid of awkward phrasings and start thinking differently, working on weak points. I make sure to pick suitable materials and diverse tasks.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Seit lange Zeit helfe ich meinen Freunden in der Schule und erkläre Ihnen die Sachen. Da ich selbst nicht in Deutschland aufgewachsen bin, kenne ich die Schwierigkeiten, die man beim Lernen einer neuen Sprache haben könnte und helfe dir gern, sie möglichst zu vermeiden.

В школе я часто помогаю друзьям, объясняя какой-либо материал.Так как я не родилась в Германии, то знаю какие сложности могут возникнуть при изучении нового языка и постараюсь сделать всё возможное,чтобы это было как можно легче.

At school I help my friends by explaining some things. Because I did not grow up in Germany I understand all difficulties you may have by learning a new language.I will try make as easy as possible
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Ich glaube, dass für jeden Schüler der Unterricht etwa anders aussehen soll. Ich werde natürlich viel mit Beispielen und verschiedenen Bildern arbeiten. So ist es etwa leichter, die Sachen zu verstehen. Ansonsten sag mir deine Wünsche und ich werde es versuchen, sie so gut wie möglich umzusetzen.

Я думаю, что каждый ученик индивидуален и поэтому стоит лучше обговаривать метод работы, чтобы достичь максимального успеха. Конечно же мы будем много общаться и использовать много различного материала.

I think it is important to speak with every student to find a  best way to learn new language. It could be texts, pictures, videos etc and of course speaking as much as possible.

My lessons can include videos to practice listening skills and text to improve reading abilities. Depending on your level, we can take any topic and use it as a tool to challenge your speaking skills. I like to focus on pronunciation and accent improvement as well.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello guys! My name is Evgeniya and I love teaching English (and Russian - I am a native speaker of this language). My main area of study was English Linguistics, and I also got a certificate in Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language. 
Teaching has been my full-time job for more than 5 years! If you studied English/Russian before but had no progress, or you are a complete beginner - I can help you!
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified EFL teacher, C2 level (CPE), preparation for FCE, ЕГЭ
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello guys! My name is Evgeniya and I love teaching English (and Russian - I am a native speaker of this language). My main area of study was English Linguistics, and I also got a certificate in Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language. 
Teaching has been my full-time job for more than 5 years! If you studied English/Russian before but had no progress, or you are a complete beginner - I can help you!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a very positive and kind teacher, and I love my students! I mean, you want to learn a foreign language (you are already cool!), and I am very passionate to share what I know, isn't it great?
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will focus on your goal! Every 2 months I tell you what you've achieved, what you CAN do now and what we still need to work on.
I adapt my lessons for every particular student, but nevertheless here is what I like including in my plans:
- visual support (especially when it comes to grammar)
- playing taboo with new vocabulary items (examples from real life help remember things better!)
- not only explaining, but also eliciting (you might know more than you think you do!)
- gapped sentences (so that you think about the sentence structure)
- reading short articles and news items and discussing them
- listening to audio recordings/songs
- discussing topics that are interesting for you

course_info.trial_description: Every trial lesson is unique and prepared especially for you and your level. Activities will be focused on different aspects so we understand what exactly you know/need , and you are going to see how I teach! =)

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: Improving your grammar, expanding your vocabulary and focusing on speaking about a range of different topics (we can adapt the curriculum to your needs as well and you are welcome to say what topics you are more interested in)

pro_course_detail.title: English for Teenagers
pro_course_detail.description: We can make lessons entertaining and keep them effective, did you know? All my activities are interactive and focus on communication as well as on grammar points. No boring books, only techniques that work and keep you interested in what you are learning!

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description: Focusing on how to communicate in different work scenarios, building and expanding your business vocabulary, set phrases and grammar patterns that work best for business discourse.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation lessons
pro_course_detail.description: I teach the British variant of English; here we are going to work on sounds, stress and prosody (intonation patterns) so that you sound natural to native speakers! Phonetics is my passion :)

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для начинающих (Russian for beginners)
pro_course_detail.description: Starting from scratch might seem difficult, but we are going to learn so much, isn't it great! If we start from complete zero, at first I will explain things in English of course, but believe me, you will say your first phrases in Russian at the first lesson, guaranteed!) We will focus on pronunciation, reading, grammar and speaking)

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для продолжающих (Intermediate Russian)
pro_course_detail.description: You learned some Russian and want to improve your progress? Planning a trip to Russia and feeling insecure about your listening/ speaking skills? Great, lets work on your conversational practice, different dialogues, polish your grammar and expand your vocabulary. It's going to be fun and effective!

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык - Продвинутый уровень (Advanced Russian)
pro_course_detail.description: Вы уже много умеете, но не хватает постоянной практики? Запомнили много слов и все окончания падежей, но уверенности при разговоре не хватает? Чувствуете, что понимаете почти всё, но остались "темные пятна"? Нужен русский язык для работы? У меня есть специальный курс для продвинутых студентов, где мы работаем именно над вашими слабыми местами и улучшаем беглость речи. Записывайтесь на урок!

teacher_info.intro: Hello friends! I'm a native speaker of Russian but at the same time I am a professional English teacher. I love English and I really love teaching it! That is why I would like to help you in learing English. No matter what level of the language you have I will be glad to help you improve all language skills you need. During my lessons, I work with different kinds of textbooks as well as with various additional materials. All my classes are based on individual needs and aims of students. I am open to your ideas and suggestions to make our lessons interesting and useful. Feel free to contact me if you want to book a lesson :)
teacher_info.about_me: Hello friends! I'm a native speaker of Russian but at the same time I am a professional English teacher. I love English and I really love teaching it! That is why I would like to help you in learing English. No matter what level of the language you have I will be glad to help you improve all language skills you need. During my lessons, I work with different kinds of textbooks as well as with various additional materials. All my classes are based on individual needs and aims of students. I am open to your ideas and suggestions to make our lessons interesting and useful. Feel free to contact me if you want to book a lesson :)
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am an English teacher with a Master's degree in Linguistics. I graduated from Rostov-on-Don Teachers' Training university in 2000. I've been teaching English since since 2009 and the age of my students ranges from 10 to 60. Also, I have obtained TKT certificates of Cambridge (Teaching Knowledge Test) and this training helps me a lot in my teaching practice. My main and the only goal as an English teacher is to help students improve all language skills by means of practical conversation and grammar.
teacher_info.teaching_style: In my lessons, I am more an informal teacher rather than a formal one. I always do my best to adapt lessons to interests, goals and  levels of students. I use authentic textbooks, online resources, books, articles, videos... everything that maybe useful in improving your language skills. I also offer you personal approach, additional materials on the topic, and progress monitoring.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
**Attention**
CANCELLATION POLICY
Rescheduling of the lesson is possible if you notify me more than 24 hours in advance. In case if you are not able to attend the class at the last minute due to any reason, please I kindly expect you to pay for the lesson. 

LATE POLICY
I am waiting for you 10 minutes at the beginning of the lesson. If you don't show up, I consider the lesson as completed and expect to receive the payment for it.

pro_course_detail.title: General English (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: I teach  all levels of General English and I have an experience of teaching it to students  from elementary to advanced. Each level of General English suggests a lot of speaking practice which is the most important skill to be developed during the course time. Adding to this, it also suggests developemnt of reading, writing, and listening language skills. It supplies with great amount of new and practical vocabulary  which will be very helpful for everyday life in an English-speaking country. Grammar is studied strating from elementary to advanced and that makes it easy to understand.

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking Practice course
pro_course_detail.description:
Speaking Practice course

If your goal is to have a nice and enjoyable conversations in English, this Speaking Practice course is for you. These lessons will provide you with multiple number of useful words and phrases for everyday communication. 

We can choose any topic for conversation according to your interests and needs as well as make our lessons at your own pace; I will correct you where necessary and we may always stop for some grammar explanation. We will stay on one topic as much time as it is necessary for you in order to develop speaking skills and achieve the best result. 

Please note that SPEAKING time sometimes might be characterized with spontaneity and be a kind of messy. For this reason, please be patient during your speaking lesson. 

You are always welcome on my Speaking Practice course :)

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
The Course of Business English will help you to improve your English skills for business as well as work. The aim of the course is to teach you how to have effective communication in English in various professional contexts. 

What will you do during your lerssons? You will watch different kinds of videos, listen to audio and read texts focused on the business world. These activities will expand your vocabulary, improve your written and speaking ability in English. Adding to this, both your vocabulary will be enriched with terminology and skills will be developed. This will make you apply your knowledge in written emails and reports, negotiations, telephone conversations,  and professional presentations. 

You are welcome to Business English :)

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar
pro_course_detail.description:
The course of English Grammar is meant to supply you with knowledge of the rules of English grammar. You will also learn key concepts and strategies of grammar which enhance your writing and speaking skills.

You will learn

- how to identify the relationships of words in a sentence
- grammatical concepts and syntactical strategies
- how to apply your knowledge to produce your own writing, coherent and compelling.

teacher_info.intro: 本硕专业都是俄语语言文学，从大二开始带团做翻译，有很多俄罗斯朋友，毕业后也在保持沟通。研究生是申请到了俄罗斯教育部奖学金，在新西伯利亚国立大学学习生活两年。毕业后会做一些相关的翻译或者俄语主持工作。
teacher_info.short_signature: 只用一节课就能带领俄语小白入门并体验俄语流利说的成就感～
teacher_info.about_me: 本硕专业都是俄语语言文学，从大二开始带团做翻译，有很多俄罗斯朋友，毕业后也在保持沟通。研究生是申请到了俄罗斯教育部奖学金，在新西伯利亚国立大学学习生活两年。毕业后会做一些相关的翻译或者俄语主持工作。

teacher_info.teaching_style:
课程：可以根据每位学员的需求进行定制化课程安排，在规定时间内达到期待的学习效果～
教学风格：本人不是严肃型，喜欢在轻松快乐的氛围中一起学习提高

course_info.trial_description: 学员可以提前沟通想要学习的俄语内容和预期希望达到的学习效果，了解学员本省语言水平后根据学员具体需求定制课程内容，准备学习资料，课程中有针对性的讲解与训练，使学员能够了解后期课程情况并有兴趣继续深入学习。

pro_course_detail.title: 俄语基础入门
pro_course_detail.description:
针对初学者进行入门课程讲解，学员可以初步感受并了解俄语。

教学内容包括：
俄语字母读写；
俄语字母歌；
基础俄语对话（日常问候语 & 简单的自我介绍）

也可以根据学生的需求定制化教学内容，使学生保持学习兴趣并达到设定的课程学习目标

pro_course_detail.title: 环游俄罗斯
pro_course_detail.description:
结合视频、图片等资料介绍俄罗斯的风土人情，在这个过程中不断积累俄语词汇量，同时学会一些地道的俄语句式表达，使学员能够自如的用俄语介绍一个地方。
由于俄罗斯幅员辽阔，学员可以根据兴趣选择想要了解的地方，进行重点学习。

pro_course_detail.title: 俄罗斯文学赏析
pro_course_detail.description: 俄罗斯文学在世界上享有盛誉，各种历史文化名人灿如星辰。希望通过这个课程带学生一起去阅读俄语原版文学，感受原汁原味的俄罗斯文学。可以选择小说章节、诗歌朗诵等，根据学生的能力和兴趣进行选择，课后能够达到全俄语概述所读章节内容或者背诵喜欢的诗歌。

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Сейчас учусь на преподавателя русского языка как иностранного, поэтому здесь смогу внедрять пройденные в университете методики и помогать студентам более квалифицированно. teacher_info.teaching_style:

Students' demand is always on first place for me: I can change the topics and objects of our lessons\conversations according to students' desire or necessity. For example, if student need technical Russian vocabulary, I'll research the subject myself, then implement needed vocabulary into our classes.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Sergey and I am from Siberia, Russia. I am a certified English and Russian teacher. I love travelling, cooking, helping animals and learning languages! Yes, I am a language learner myself, that's why I know many techniques, tricks and language-hacks which can help you to learn language faster and more effectively.
teacher_info.introduction: Hi! My name is Sergey! I’m from Siberia. Russian is my native language, but also I speak English since I was 5 years old. I graduated from Baikal Business School (Siberian-American Department), where I got a degree of BBA (Bachelor of Business and Administration) and was studing business English. For me, learning languages it’s a journey, full of adventures and discoveries. And like any other journey, it’s not always easy to walk it alone. That’s why I suggest you my help, so we can walk this path together and overcome all obstacles on our way. With me, you can easily manage the contents of our lessons, whether you need to concentrate on grammar, pronunciation or improve your speaking skills. Also, I can help you to set your language goals, and make sure that you can achieve them. I have lots of hobbies and interests, like travelling, climbing, music, drums, languages, anthropology, cooking, baking, acting, dancing, etc. So I’m sure, that we will have a lot of things to talk about and you can increase your vocabulary incredibly. If you are interested to have a lesson with me, schedule it as soon as possible! And don’t forget to include some message about yourself, your language level and what do you expect from our lessons! See you!
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Sergey and I am from Siberia, Russia. I am a certified English and Russian teacher. I love travelling, cooking, helping animals and learning languages! Yes, I am a language learner myself, that's why I know many techniques, tricks and language-hacks which can help you to learn language faster and more effectively.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
My Free Russian Course for Beginners on my YouTube channel: youtube.com/inrussianfromafar
My Podcast: https://we.fo/1514758239
According to my bachelor degree, I'm a manager. However, through my journey I found something I'm good at - teaching. I always had a good presenting and conversational skills. Besides,  I always liked to help people and make them motivated to reach their goals. And, I had a proficiency in language. These things helped me to realize my career path. I started to teach English to kids in Vietnam  in 2014. After a while, I started to teach on iTalki. I've learned most teaching techniques and methods through my own experience. In 2017 I got first real TEFL certificate.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Style update:
Since 2019 I became a fan of TPRS (Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling) and CI (Comprehensible Input) methods in language learning. These methods helps my students to acquire a language in the most relaxed and fun manner. I use different children stories, pictures, magazines so my students study grammar from the real content without even realizing it. Isn't it awesome? 
My lessons absolutely depend on my students' needs. Also, initially I test my students to see their level, and I adapt my lessons according to it. Generally, I let my students to work in the context of their interests, because I believe that's the fastest and easiest way to learn the language.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Absolute Beginners  A0-A2
pro_course_detail.description:
(По-русски ниже) 
This is the course for absolute beginners, who has level A0-A1. Here we are going build your base in learing the language. Usually this course will take about 30-50 hours. We are going to focus on such things like basic grammar, pronunciation, and of course speaking skills, because the secret of learning the language, is to start talking from the day 1.

Этот курс расчитан на тех, у кого абсолютно отсутсвуют знания языка, либо они очень небольшиие. Я помогу вам построить правильную базу, с которой вам будет легко и комфортно продолжать изучение языка даже самостоятельно. Мы будет активно работать над базовой грамматикой, произношением, и конечно же, мы будет говорить на английском, ведь для большинства людей, это главная цель.
